newsitem.title: HONG KONG: Nordic Investment Bank prices HK$1.0 bln bond.
newsitem.headline: Nordic Investment Bank prices HK$1.0 bln bond.

text.p: Nordic Investment Bank's HK$1.0 billion 7.37 percent fixed rate bond due 2004 was priced at 100.34, lead manager HSBC Markets said on Monday.
The bond was priced to yield 7.5103 percent, or 39.5 basis points over the 6.80 percent Hong Kong Exchange Fund Note due November 2003 and 90 basis points over the interpolated U.S. Treasury note.
Details are as follows:
BORROWER NORDIC INVESTMENT BANK
AMT HK$1.0 BLN COUPON 7.37 PCT MATURITY 12.FEB.04
TYPE BOND ISS PRICE 100.34 PAY DATE 12.FEB.97
LAST MOODY AAA* REOFFER 100.34 LAUNCH 13.JAN.97
LAST S&P AAA* YIELD 7.5103 DENOMS HK$1 MLN
LISTING LONDON PAY FREQ QUARTERLY REPLIES 13.JAN.97
SALE LIMIT STANDARD FULL FEES 30 BP
NEG PLG NO CRS DEFLT NO FORCE MAJ YES
GOV LAW ENGLISH HOME CTRY SUPRANATIONAL
LEAD HSBC MARKETS
PAY AGENT CITIBANK LUXEMBOURG
NOTE *ISSUER RATINGS. ISSUE RATINGS TO BE OBTAINED.
**APPLICATION HAS BEEN MADE TO THE HKMA TO ACCEPT THE
ISSUE AS ELIGIBLE FOR ITS LIQUIDITY ADJUSTMENT FACILITY
(LAF), OR DISCOUNT WINDOW.
***ISSUE YIELDS 7.5103 PCT ON AN ANNUAL BASIS, OR 39.5
BASIS POINTS OVER THE 6.80 PCT HK EFN DUE 2003 OR
90 BASIS POINTS OVER COMPARABLE US TREASURIES.
WITHHOLDING TAX GROSS UP
PARI PASSU, UNSUBORDINATED. THE BOND IS OFF THE ISSUER'S
EMTN PROGRAMME. SETTLEMENT THROUGH CMU.
A GROUP IS BEING FORMED
--Hong Kong Newsroom (852) 2843 6960
